q: She was rubbing our hands and gripping our hands so... we knew she could hear and understand what we were saying and she moved her leg, and so we knew she was responding,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said. at Mr. Colin Powell 's contention that he was misled by faulty intelligence into making the public case for the invasion of Iraq.`` Colin Powell was not duped or misled by anybody,'' Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes.
